profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Test Automation Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in Test Automation and CI/CD processes, utilizing tools such as **Jenkins**, **GitLab CI**, and **Docker**. My technical expertise includes **Python** and automation frameworks like **Playwright**, ensuring efficient and effective testing solutions. I possess strong skills in performance and load testing, leveraging tools like **Elastic Stack** and **Splunk** for comprehensive log collection and analysis. 
In addition to my automation prowess, my background includes deep experience in cloud services such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. My problem-solving abilities, combined with effective communication and collaboration skills, support the development of robust testing environments in both **Linux** and **Windows** platforms. Moreover, my proficiency in **Kubernetes** complements my dedication to building scalable and resilient test automation frameworks. With a proven track record of driving quality and compliance in high-performance environments, I am committed to delivering top-notch solutions.
